SME NETWORK.title: S220-8T4S
SME NETWORK.description: S220-8T4S(8*10/100/1000BASE-T ports, 4*GE SFP ports, built-in AC power)

specifications.Service port surge protection: PoE port: Common mode (8 wires to ground): 6 kV (1.2/50 us, 42 ohms), criterion B Differential mode (48 V-RTN): 0.5 kV (1.2/50 us, 42 ohms), criterion B
specifications.Maximum number of physical ports on the: GE (RJ45) x 1, 10M/100M/1000M auto-sensing GE SFP x 1
specifications.Long-term operating temperature [°C(°F)]: -40°C to 65°C(From 1800 m to 5000 m [5905.51 ft. to 16404.20 ft.], the maximum temperature of the device decreases by 1°C [1.8°F] for every 300 m [984.25 ft.] increase in altitude.)
specifications.Maximum transmit power: 2.4G: 28dBm(Max) 5G: 27dBm(Max) (note: this is MIMO total radio power, the same as: 2.4G: 25dBm/chain(Max) 5G : 24dBm/chain(Max)) BLE：＜10dBm

IdeaHub.title: IdeaHub B2-65
IdeaHub.description: HUAWEI IdeaHub B2 is the next-generation intelligent meeting panel that delivers HD cloud conferencing. With dual Wi-Fi design and an optical anti-blue light feature, it offers an upgraded projection and writing experience perfect for multiple office environments, including meeting rooms, manager offices, and open office areas.
